overview:
Clarity Consultancy Services is a Bristol based financial managment consultancy firm. Services include:

Spreadsheet Risk Management Ensuring that clients remain in control of their spreadsheets. 9 out of 10 financial models contain tax errors. On average 5% of all formulae cells contain errors. Clarity Consultancy Services work with their clients to identify, evaluate, remediate and control their spreadsheets.

Bespoke Excel Training Providing on site courses tailored to the clientâ€™s needs. Clarity Consultancy Services’ trainers are qualified accountants and are experts in developing Excel models to recognised best practice standards. Importantly, they are also business consultants and therefore understand how best to apply Excel in the business environment.

Change Management Helping clients to deliver change within their Finance function. As well as being qualified accountants, their consultants are qualified and experienced project managers. Clarity Consultancy Services help their clients throughout the project life cycle.
